name: Housefire
description:
The objective of the game is to escape by moving tile to tile while flames engulf your home! The game consists of seven levels.

The game is built with an engine made from the ground up with no external libraries. It is its first game implementation, and likely a bit buggy :)

It also comes with a level editor if you feel like making your own levels. Press ` and  do your best to navigate the incredibly crude UI.

Engine and game were programmed by me and art / modeling done by my awesome fiance.
